name: Ginny Stikeman

roles_in_work.title: Forbidden love: the unashamed stories of lesbian lives

biography: Virginia "Ginny" Stikeman is a Canadian filmmaker, director, producer and editor known for her documentary work. Stikeman had a 30-year career at the National Film Board of Canada, and led its women's unit, Studio D, from 1990 until its closure in 1996.
